## Bin and String io
*** 
### scene
**prepare current data, in char\* or unsigned char\*\*, write it to file by bin way or string write way**
> 

**this will cost read size more then and parse error**
> read file by bin way

**this will cost normal data read**
> read file by string read way

***
### principle
